nodes.text: A Chiss male served as a delegate representing the Chiss Ascendancy to the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. However, the delegate was killed in a fight with an Imperial officer in the Sunken Sarlacc cantina, forcing the Empire to frame the Balmorran resistance for the crime.
The Chiss delegate's body appears in the mission "Body of Evidence" for players on the Imperial version of Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
